capability.name: Publicreferencedatamanagement
capability.definition: Provide structured access to standard 'global' reference data and definitions associated with market activity such as currency, country and segment identifiers.
capability.role: This service domain maintains and provides structured access to standard 'global' reference data and definitions associated with market activity such as currency, country and segment identifiers. These values will typically be externally sourced using market information feeds and distributed using whatever is the appropriate mechanism within the bank
capability.example: The international ISO standard definitions are maintained and applied across production systems of the bank

key_features.name: Identify global data standards and sources
key_features.description: Enables identify global data standards and sources to support provide structured access to standard 'global' reference data and definitions associated with market activity such as currency, country and segment identifiers

key_features.name: Arrange for access to external reference data sources
key_features.description: Enables arrange for access to external reference data sources to support provide structured access to standard 'global' reference data and definitions associated with market activity such as currency, country and segment identifiers

key_features.name: Import and disseminate public/global reference data
key_features.description: Enables import and disseminate public/global reference data to support provide structured access to standard 'global' reference data and definitions associated with market activity such as currency, country and segment identifiers
